column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's is my favorite deep dish pizza place. I get the Chicago style deep dish which has a butter crust
column4: and the right amount of seasoning. Giordano's is good
column5: but I find it too be too salty. Ricobene's is decent
column6: but their breaded steaks are better. Doesn't matter which Lou Malnati's you go to they all taste the same.
